CustomField.description: Determines the format used to present contextual SObject data to the LLM. The agent's 'Instructions Prompt' should be written to match this chosen format for best results.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose how data is formatted for the AI. 'Structured Text' is efficient and readable. 'XML' is more structured but uses more tokens. 'JSON' provides structured data optimized for modern LLMs. Match your Instructions Prompt to the selected format.
CustomField.label: Context Format Strategy
